original_definition: 'hot water storage tank' means a vessel for storing hot water for water and/or space heating purposes, including any additives, which is not equipped with any heat generator except possibly one or more back-up immersion heaters;
generated_definition: 'hot water storage tank' means a tank used to store hot water for various uses, such as bathing, washing, and space heating.
